tool_description: Gathers and organizes client preferences, style requirements, and constraints for portrait sessions to inform planning decisions.

client_name.description: Name of the client for the portrait session

session_type.description: Type of portrait session: headshot, family, engagement, maternity, corporate, fashion, or artistic

preferred_style.description: Desired photography style: natural, dramatic, vintage, modern, candid, or formal

indoor_outdoor_preference.description: Location preference: indoor, outdoor, or both

budget_range.description: Budget category: economy, standard, premium, or luxury

error_messages: Invalid session type: Must be one of [headshot, family, engagement, maternity, corporate, fashion, artistic]
Invalid style preference: Must be one of [natural, dramatic, vintage, modern, candid, formal]
Invalid location preference: Must be one of [indoor, outdoor, both]
Invalid budget range: Must be one of [economy, standard, premium, luxury]
Missing client name: Client name cannot be empty
usage: Provide client_name, session_type, preferred_style, and budget_range. Optionally specify indoor_outdoor_preference. Use this as the first step in session planning to establish baseline requirements.

client_profile.description: Summary of client preferences and requirements

style_guidelines.description: List of style-specific guidelines and recommendations
